name: Blind Love (Brandon's)
description:
See, we tried to make this game for the jam, but classes left us without time, nonetheless we'll share the original idea for the game and let you play our buggy as heck prototype.

You're Brandon, a guy in love with his weapon (history behind that in the full realease (if there's one)) even though it's crap, sometimes it does not shoot, sometime it shoots double and a lot of other things. 

You'll share his adventures against everything the world has to throw at him, how long will you survive with this old gun? 

Game concept is a comedic ghost n goblins type of game (or metal slugish) with a dramatic backstory and REAL soundtrack, not what you will hear on this prototype.

Accepting every critique, but we already know it's full of bugs and will fix it or scrap it, thanks for any feedback and giving us a chance!
